description.narrative: Output 3.1 : Policy Development, community and Health System Strengthening and Capacity BuildingRelevant policies are developed, community and health systems and interventions of HIV/AIDS are coordinated for the optimal utilization of resources and to ensure equity in services provision

sector.narrative: Child poverty public advocacy (media and social media, campaigns)

Contributing to policies reducing child poverty: Poverty reduction strategies, national development plans, engagement with ministries, parliament, international donor and financial organizations, civil society organizations)
Development of multi-sectoral legislation/policies/strategies/action plans supporting development and participation of adolescents
HIV and AIDS monitoring and bottleneck analysis
PF4C - domestic revenue mobilization and access to finance for key social services
Procurement and or supply management for HIV diagnostics and medicine
Public health emergencies, including disease outbreaks
Support Policy and guidance developments and address barriers to accessing HIV services by adolescents including gender mainstreaming

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 3.1 : Policy Development, community and Health System Strengthening and Capacity BuildingRelevant policies are developed, community and health systems and interventions of HIV/AIDS are coordinated for the optimal utilization of resources and to ensure equity in services provision

description.narrative: Key strategic documentations were developed in 2016 to ensure conducive environment for HIV prevention, care and treatment i.e. the National HIV Strategic Plan 2016-2020 and the National Adolescent Health Policy. A National Youth Policy is currently being drafted for validation in early 2017. | Status:Met | As-of Date:23/01/2017

actual.value: 2016:2 field joint mission on PMTCT and 2 Field joint mission on Adolescents and HIV
